column1: 3 Marks Theory,State any three special characteristics of a Friend Function.,1. Not in the scope of the class. 2. Can be called without an object. 3. Has access to private members.
4 Marks Theory,Explain the concept of Virtual Memory in detail.,Virtual memory is a memory management technique that creates an illusion of a very large main memory by using disk space...
C++ Programs,Write a C++ program to find the largest of three numbers.,"#include <iostream>
if(a>=b && a>=c) cout << a << "" is largest""
else if(b>=a && b>=c) cout << b << "" is largest""
HTML Programs,Write HTML code to create a link to 'google.com' that opens in a new tab.,"Visit Google"
